%n file was imported from Google Drive.
%n files were imported from Google Drive.
translations.Google integration allows you to automat: Google integration allows you to automatically migrate your Google calendars, contacts, photos and files into Nextcloud.
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: If you want to allow your Nextcloud users to authenticate to Google, create an OAuth application in your Google settings.
translations.Go to \"APIs & Services\" => \"Credentia: Go to "APIs & Services" => "Credentials" and click on "+ CREATE CREDENTIALS" -> "OAuth client ID".
translations.Set the \"Application type\" to \"Web ap: Set the "Application type" to "Web application" and give a name to the application.
translations.Make sure you set one \"Authorized redir: Make sure you set one "Authorized redirect URI" to
translations.Put the \"Client ID\" and \"Client secre: Put the "Client ID" and "Client secret" below.
translations.Finally, go to \"APIs & Services\" => \": Finally, go to "APIs & Services" => "Library" and add the following APIs: "Google Drive API", "Google Calendar API", "People API" and "Photos Library API".
translations.Your Nextcloud users will then see a \"C: Your Nextcloud users will then see a "Connect to Google" button in their personal settings.
translations.Client ID of your Google application: Client ID of your Google application
